message.content:
The most likely category for this paper is "Books" because it is a textbook on criminal justice. 

The second most likely category is "Education" because the paper is an introductory text for the subject of criminal justice.

The third most likely category is "Law" because the paper is about the criminal justice system.

The fourth most likely category is "Social Sciences" because the paper is based on sociology and criminology.

The fifth most likely category is "Politics & Social Sciences" because the paper discusses the field of criminal justice.

prompt:
Title: Criminal Justice Today: An Introductory Text for the 21st Century (12th Edition)
Content: Frank Schmalleger, Ph.D., is Distinguished Professor Emeritus at the University of North Carolina at Pembroke. He holds degrees from the University of Notre Dame and Ohio State University, having earned both a master’s (1970) and a doctorate in sociology (1974) from Ohio State University with a special emphasis in criminology. From 1976 to 1994, he taught criminology and criminal justice courses at the University of North Carolina at Pembroke. For the last 16 of those years, he chaired the...
